Dinobot arrived at a little outpost that offered boat transportation.
He tr=
ansformed and went to the operator.

Dinobot: [grunt] Greetings. I need to =
go to Atlantis.

Operator: Atlantis, eh? Well, you can take that boat t'ere=
, but you'd
better be waitin'. We won't do a trip with you alone, eh?

The =
raptor got insulted and clacked his left claw, without raising.

Dinobot: [=
Grunt] Why? Do you not trust my goodwill?

The covered threat did its effec=
t.

Operator: Oh, um, no, sir. I didn' mean t'at at all. I's jus that it
co=
sts a lot of energon, so we wait for s'more people before we go.

Dinobot f=
ell silent as he understood. This planet was full of
goody-twoshoes maximal=
s! That guy was being honest and scared!

Dinobot: Oh. My [grunt] apologies=
. I shall wait on the boat then.

He walk onto the deck and sat in a corner=
, keeping to himself. A few
hours later, they left with more people aboard.=
 They all looked like
Rhinox did, he thought, only less dangerous than him.=


What the pit was going on here?
